name: Gertrude Stein’s Coffee
description: Stein said “Coffee is a lot more than just a drink; it’s something happening. Not as in hip, but like an event, a place to be, but not like a location, but like somewhere within yourself. It gives you time, but not actual hours or minutes, but a chance to be, like be yourself, and have a second cup”. A digital extraction from a tangible painting. You are free to have the image printed and framed but copyright always remains with the artist; this means you can't sell prints or reproductions or copies of the image; you can, of course, re-sell this image on the blockchain :)
